job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Within the Data Office, we have a team responsible for building impactful AI solutions. With these AI solutions, we help our business unit Schade & Inkomen to digitize important processes. An example of this is the digitization of our Claims processes. Your main goal is to deploy/roll out the AI solutions of your colleagues/the AI solution made together with your colleagues in a scalable and secure way., In the past year, we have set up various applications using LLMs and we are now looking for an experienced Machine Learning Engineer to further scale these applications and help build new AI solutions. You provide a clear vision of the required Cloud architecture and manage it for our AI solutions. With your solution-oriented and proactive mindset, you help the team scale and make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy. We work agile with colleagues from the business on projects that are often sprint-transcending.

   In concrete terms, you bring AI solutions to production so that your solutions really create value for our company of tomorrow. Exploring and applying new technology plays an important role. In addition, you actively contribute to innovation within NN. During our monthly innovation day, you investigate with your colleagues which new techniques are applicable within our company.
job_details.full_text:
Azure Genai Devops Engineer

Within the Data Office, we have a team responsible for building impactful AI solutions. With these AI solutions, we help our business unit Schade & Inkomen to digitize important processes. An example of this is the digitization of our Claims processes. Your main goal is to deploy/roll out the AI solutions of your colleagues/the AI solution made together with your colleagues in a scalable and secure way., In the past year, we have set up various applications using LLMs and we are now looking for an experienced Machine Learning Engineer to further scale these applications and help build new AI solutions. You provide a clear vision of the required Cloud architecture and manage it for our AI solutions. With your solution-oriented and proactive mindset, you help the team scale and make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy. We work agile with colleagues from the business on projects that are often sprint-transcending.

   In concrete terms, you bring AI solutions to production so that your solutions really create value for our company of tomorrow. Exploring and applying new technology plays an important role. In addition, you actively contribute to innovation within NN. During our monthly innovation day, you investigate with your colleagues which new techniques are applicable within our company.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes deploying and scaling AI solutions built with LLMs, building new AI solutions, and providing vision for cloud architecture for AI solutions. It also mentions exploring and applying new technology, and contributing to innovation with new techniques. This aligns strongly with the definition and core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems and leveraging generative models.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'building new AI solutions' and the mention of 'applications using LLMs' directly relate to the creation and adaptation of AI models.
The mention of 'applications using LLMs' indicates work with generative models.
The core responsibility is to 'deploy/roll out the AI solutions' and 'bring AI solutions to production', which involves building and integrating AI features into production systems.
The phrase 'help build new AI solutions' implies software development activities around AI.
The primary focus on 'deploy/roll out the AI solutions' in a 'scalable and secure way' and bringing them 'to production' directly aligns with MLOps responsibilities.
job_tasks.phrase: deploy/roll out the AI solutions in a scalable and secure way

job_tasks.justification: The role involves managing the 'Cloud architecture' for AI solutions, which is a key aspect of MLOps for production environments.
job_tasks.phrase: manage it for our AI solutions

job_tasks.justification: The goal to 'scale and make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy' is a core MLOps objective.
job_tasks.phrase: scale and make the best AI solution for business problems production-worthy

job_tasks.justification: Bringing 'AI solutions to production' is a direct MLOps task.
The role is within the 'Data Office' and aims to help the business unit 'digitize important processes', indicating an understanding of business needs.
job_tasks.phrase: help our business unit Schade & Inkomen to digitize important processes

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'make the best AI solution for business problems' shows a focus on aligning AI solutions with business needs.
job_tasks.phrase: make the best AI solution for business problems

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'projects that are often sprint-transcending' and working 'agile with colleagues from the business' suggests an understanding of business processes and agile methodologies.
job_tasks.phrase: work agile with colleagues from the business

soft_skills.phrase: investigate with your colleagues which new techniques are applicable
